QuestData.Title: Chop Chop
QuestData.Description: I deal in small timber plenty, but full trees? That's a novelty item. Kinda like those boulders.$B$BMaybe you can do me another favor. Just west of town there's a grove of trees overlooking Lake Kel'theril. I don't know if it's the spooks there, or all that elf magic junk strewn around the place, but we've been getting treants and lashers wandering around there recently.$B$BThey're making it a real pain to chop wood over there, so why don't you chop some of them? Bring the wood from the treants back here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 pieces of Fresh-Cut Frostwood from Frostleaf Treants.
QuestData.RewardText: Not a bad haul. Maybe we should look into growin' those treants instead...
